World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 26 日星期一 10:09:04 GMT 120
Nawaz Sharif's daughter elected to head Pakistan's Punjab, seen as stepping stoneMaryam Nawaz, the daughter of Pakistan's three-time former prime minister Nawaz Sharif, was elected on Monday as the head of the country's most populous province, Punjab, in a move underlining the expanding grip of the family in the South Asian nation. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:57:56 GMT BQM3NYRC4FO2TPCSQVXXGL7ZUI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/nawaz-sharifs-daughter-elected-head-pakistans-punjab-seen-stepping-stone-2024-02-26/Asif Shahzad, Mubasher Bukhari世界亚太地区
Turkey tells World Court occupation is root cause of Israeli-Palestinian conflictTurkey's Deputy Foreign Minister Ahmet Yildiz told judges at the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Monday that Israeli occupation of Palestinian territories is the root cause of conflict in the region. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:55:31 GMT AOR4Z5P3RFLEDKNZ547TP66VUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-tells-world-court-ocupation-is-root-cause-israeli-palestinian-conflict-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中东
Israel-Hezbollah strikes cloud Lebanon's economy, minister saysLebanon's long-troubled economy is shrouded in uncertainty by conflict on its southern border between Israeli forces and Hezbollah militants, Lebanon's economy minister said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:48:29 GMT RNA3RQY2SJJLRBIJF2R5G4JKNA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-hezbollah-strikes-cloud-lebanons-economy-minister-says-2024-02-26/Alexander Cornwell世界中东
Russian bank boss Kostin rejects US charge of sanctions violationsAndrei Kostin, CEO of Russia's No. 2 bank VTB , has rejected a U.S. charge that he illegally circumvented sanctions restrictions, calling accusations in a U.S. court indictment "groundless". Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:36:11 GMT UACCF57655OKFKMCQTGPTMZLVA https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-bank-boss-kostin-rejects-us-charge-sanctions-violations-2024-02-26/Reuters世界
Denmark ends probe into Nord Stream pipeline blastsDenmark on Monday said it had dropped its investigation into the explosions in 2022 on the Nord Stream pipelines carrying Russian gas to Germany, becoming the second nation to do so after neighbouring Sweden closed its own inquiry. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:21:47 GMT K6QVUXLWBFMNXNRTCZ2ALMG2GA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/denmark-ends-investigation-into-nord-stream-pipeline-blasts-2024-02-26/Stine Jacobsen, Louise Rasmussen商业活力
Protesting farmers jam Brussels with tractors as ministers meetFarmers set fire to piles of old tyres in Brussels on Monday in a protest to demand EU action on issues ranging from cheap supermarket prices to free trade deals, as agricultural ministers gathered to discuss the crisis in the sector. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:17:05 GMT IDT2JZXKDZIGLKPMCZMTD2QNXY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/protesting-farmers-jam-brussels-with-tractors-ministers-meet-2024-02-26/Kate Abnett, Philip Blenkinsop世界欧洲
Ethiopian police arrest French journalist, employer saysEthiopian police have arrested a French journalist on suspicion of "conspiracy to create chaos", his employer said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:14:12 GMT 5T3H5UV4IFO7DMUJ4CCGJKIONM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ethiopian-police-arrest-french-journalist-employer-says-2024-02-26/Giulia Paravicini世界非洲
Palestinian Prime Minister Shtayyeh resignsPalestinian Prime Minister Mohammad Shtayyeh said on Monday he was resigning to allow for the formation of a broad consensus among Palestinians about political arrangements following Israel's war against the Islamist group Hamas in Gaza. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:06:22 GMT JSVZCV7CQBPUDB43JWWP547CSE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-prime-minister-shtayyeh-resigns-2024-02-26/Ali Sawafta世界中东
Indonesia's largest party seeks parliamentary probe into alleged election irregularitiesThe Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDIP), the country's biggest party, will seek to launch a parliamentary probe and file a case with a top court over alleged violations around this month's election, a senior official said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 08:58:11 GMT DAP3S7NGTJIM3BSE5OTY3MWKYE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-largest-party-seeks-parliamentary-probe-into-alleged-election-2024-02-26/Ananda Teresia世界亚太地区
Hezbollah says it downed Israeli drone over Lebanese territoryLebanon's Hezbollah said on Monday it had shot down an Israeli Hermes 450 drone over Lebanese territory with a surface-to-air missile, the second time it has announced a downing of this type of unmanned aerial vehicle. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 08:57:58 GMT RQHJQ565MJMMLJJQ2JKCVNGSFI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-says-it-downed-israeli-drone-over-lebanese-territory-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中东
Kyiv urges Poland to punish those behind Ukrainian grain spillsKyiv has urged Poland to punish those responsible for spills of a Ukrainian grain cargo at the border over the weekend, Deputy Prime Minister Oleksandr Kubrakov said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 07:54:30 GMT LTWEBQDFMNPRHEPFAIDTD62CAU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kyiv-urges-poland-punish-those-behind-ukrainian-grain-spills-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
